info.name: printer-supplies-api
info.description: REST API for printer supplies management, for data analysis and control.

item.name: supplies
drums

request.description: Provides the count of drums registered in the database.
Searches for a drum by its ID.
Shows all drums.
Creates a new drum.
Updates an existing drum.
Deletes a drum by its ID.

item.description: Endpoints for the CRUD of drums.

item.name: toners

request.description: Provides the count of toners registered in the database.
Searches for a toner by its ID.
Shows all toners.
Creates a new toner.
Updates an existing toner.
Deletes a toner by its ID.

item.description: Endpoints for the CRUD of toners.
Endpoints for the CRUDs of supplies.

item.name: brands

request.description: Provides the count of brands registered in the database.
Searches for a brand by its ID.
Shows all brands.
Creates a new brand.
Updates an existing brand.
Deletes a brand by its ID.

item.description: Endpoints for the CRUD of brands.

item.name: printers

request.description: Provides the count of printers registered in the database.
Searches for a printer by its ID.
Shows all printers.
Creates a new printer.
Updates an existing printer.
Deletes a printer by its ID.

item.description: Endpoints for the CRUD of printers.

item.name: movements

request.description: Provides the count of all movements registered in the database.
Provides the count of toner movements registered in the database.
Provides the count of drum movements registered in the database.
Searches for a movement by its ID.
Shows all movements.
Shows toner movements.
Shows drum movements.
Creates a new toner movement.
Creates a new drum movement.
Updates an existing movement.
Deletes a movement by its ID.

item.description: Endpoints for the CRUD of movements.

request.description: API status endpoint, contains database information and checks if the connection is healthy.
